pageContext.claim: “We'll be coming here a lot. And we're way up in the polls. But do you know what I say? I pretend one point down everywhere. Somebody said, 'How are you doing?' I said, 'We're one point down everywhere.' But we're way up. That's what they tell me. Way up in North Carolina.”
pageContext.analysis: Recent polls of North Carolina voters had Trump losing to several of the potential Democratic presidential nominees.
